mapper.select:
select r.id ,r.name ,r.operatorCode ,r.maxFlow ,r.maxRoamFlow ,r.status ,r.level ,r.mccs ,r.departmentId ,d.name departmentName ,concat(OPERATORNAMECN,' (',r.operatorCode,')') operatorName from m_simpackage r left join m_department d on r.departmentid=d.id and d.status=0 left join m_operator t on r.OPERATORCODE=t.OPERATORCODE where 1=1
and r.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and r.name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by r.status,r.level desc
mapper.update: update m_simpackage set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATORCODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAXFLOW = #{maxFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAXROAMFLOW = #{maxRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MCCS = #{mccs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into m_simpackage (NAME, OPERATORCODE,MAXFLOW, MAXROAMFLOW,LEVEL, MCCS,status,departmentid) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mccs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,#{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
